title: Billy Shields
text: William Dean Shields (born August 23, 1954) is an American former professional <a href="American%20football">football</a> player who was an <a href="offensive%20tackle">offensive tackle</a> in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a> (NFL). He who played eleven seasons for the <a href="San%20Diego%20Chargers">San Diego Chargers</a> (1975–1983), the <a href="San%20Francisco%2049ers">San Francisco 49ers</a> (1984), the <a href="Kansas%20City%20Chiefs">Kansas City Chiefs</a> (1985) and the <a href="New%20York%20Jets">New York Jets</a> (1985). Shields attended <a href="Georgia%20Institute%20of%20Technology">Georgia Institute of Technology</a>. He was inducted into the Georgia Tech Hall of Fame in 1985.
